snippet: Some witnesses said there were children in the home, located in the town of Elmira, but officials have not released the identities of the victims.
abstract: At least four people are killed when fire guts house in Elmira, New York; cause of fire is not immediately known and identities of victims have not been released.
lead_paragraph: Some witnesses said there were children in the home, located in the town of Elmira, but officials have not released the identities of the victims.

headline.main: Fire Kills 4 in Upstate New York
headline.print_headline: Fire Kills 4 in Upstate New York
